seo_component.meta_title: Tony de Faria - The centre of a brainstorm
seo_component.meta_description: I was born in Africa and grew up in Europe. My curious and open mindset has led me to discover a lot of diverse experiences in life. I don't cease to learn and, I embrace failure.
seo_component.meta_keywords: creative, thinking, digital, copy, photography, podcast, video

hero_component.title: The unknown is an opportunity to learn
hero_component.description: I'm a self-taught creative thinker and, I like to use words, images and code to express my thoughts and ideas. I'm passionate about stories that have humanity, empathy and food.
